title: A Port in Pieces
description: Theme: Hi-Lo, High school girls, best friends forever, growing up Shane, Brandi, and Marisa plan to attend Port City College for one year. But the hurricane damage is too great. The college won t reopen on time. As they ponder their future, Shane gets amazing news. Her journalism class is going to New York City. Once Brandi and Marisa hear that, they decide the entire senior class should go to the Big Apple. The PCH novels are approximately 25,000 words -- 200 Pages. Each story covers a semester and focuses on one of the three main characters., with swirling subplots involving the other girls. These best friends are determined to make the most of high school. And not get swallowed up."
author: Shannon Freeman
